name: To The Core (itch) (IRateBurritos, Phantasmasporia)
description:
Created with the incredibly talented @Flick#8212 (art), @Brady_V2#6181 (music and sound design), and Worrynaught#1355 (story) for Boss Rush Jam 2023

Inspired by Hollow Knight and DS-era Nintendo games, we embraced the jam's theme of makeshift and created To The Core, an all-new dungeon-crawling adventure in which you make your own weapon out of scraps you find lying around.

Due to time limitations the game is currently in a very early state, but we're excited to add more soon!
